name: @vetdrugs/capacitor-live-activities
description: Capacitor plugin for iOS Live Activities and Dynamic Island - supports CRI timers, CPR timers, and multi-timer management
author: VetDrugs

scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: cd ios && pod install && xcodebuild -workspace Plugin.xcworkspace -scheme Plugin -destination generic/platform=iOS && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs
